Description: Rim fragment of South Ionian Fikellura pottery amphora; interior, top and upper part on inside glazed; band below; exterior, frieze of verticals on outside above banding.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Antikenmuseum, Heidelberg. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 127-8, no. Nau 92, pl. 21, fig. c)
CVA Heidelberg I / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum Heidelberg Universität Band I (p. 11 no. 23, pl. 2 no. 23)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GF.064)
